ABTG.MI.summary: Alfio Bardolla Training Group S.p.A. operates in the personal finance education industry in Italy. The company offers courses in the field of properties, Internet royalty, business and companies, and trading; and digital and online products, diaries, ebooks, videos, and games. It also provides The Wake Up Call workshop, which provides guidance to analyze personal financial situation and will lead to find the points that will transform the situation. The company is based in Milan, Italy.
